short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your Inspector to Go! Use IP Inspector to check on your public IP address without ever leaving the current tab! Just Click and Look!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whether you are connected to a VPN or for some other reason you need to constantly track your public ipv4 address to make sure it is showing the desired location and other wanted info, just click the IP Inspector icon on the upper right corner and check it! 

Track your public ipv4 info as you're browsing other pages, without having to switch context of what you doing ever again!

You can also easily copy your ipv4 address just by clicking on it!
